page.topic: How to Install a Node Module and Call it from a Node Service in a Web Application
page.description: Node modules can be downloaded and used in Alpha Anywere web applications.

discussion.p: Web Applications can call methods in Node.js modules from server-side xbasic. The [Node_request() function] can be used to call a node service from a web application. For example, suppose you have created the following node module saved as *[tinify.js]* inside the *[node_services]* directory:

section.description: The node service defined above can be called from xbasic, such as in an .a5w page, as follows:
section.example:
<%A5 dim req as p dim req.infile as c = "C:\movieImages\snow.jpg" dim req.outfile as c = "C:\movieImages\snowSmall.jpg" dim req.resize.method as c = "fit" dim req.resize.width as n = 100 dim req.resize.height as n = 200
if file.exists(req.outfile) then file.remove(req.outfile) end if
? node_request("tinify",req)
if file.exists(req.outfile) then ? "Thumbnail was created" else ? "Thumbnail was *not* created" end if %>
